channel.title: cshotton tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from cshotton.

item.description: @brentsimmons Any tool or service that helps the free and unhindered dissemination of news and information to Russia is a service to all mankind. Pulling it is not only a "me too" gestures, but one that damages the ability for the truth to be know. Stop overthinking this and leave it alone!

@b05crypto Save your breath. People like @SenWarren are fear mongering for personal gain, pandering to a group of financial Luddites in an echo chamber that they can't hear reason in. She doesn't WANT to understand as it would show she's been wrong all along.
